input.job_description:
Ali Rehman Bhutta  
+923451030599  | 23110213@lums.edu.pk  | https://www.linkedin.com/in/alirehmanbhutta/  
EDUCATION  
Lahore University of Management Sciences                                                     
BSc (Honors) in Management Science            
- Key Courses: Integrated Marketing Communication , Supply Chain Management , Operation Management , Strategic 
Business Management , Sales Force Management , Business Ana lytics , Consumer Behavior . 
University of Baltistan  (UOBS)                                                                                                                            
Summer Exchange Semester  
• Course: Introduction to E -commerce  
Intermediate (FSc.)  – Pre-Engineering                                                                                  
• Engineering Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry  
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
DRIPSTERZ  – Co-Founder                                                                                                                                                                       Oct 20 22 – Feb 2023  
• Co-founded a preloved premium -quality sneakers brand  named DRIPSTERZ , taking a proactive approach to make fashion 
and quality accessible to everyone.  
• Streamlined the supply chain and established partnerships with 10 suppliers, procuring 400 unique pairs of premium 
sneakers within the first two months of operations.  
• Boosted sales by 30% through effective utilization of social media channels, leveraging targeted strategies to engage with 
the target audience.  
Retail E -Commerce Venture (REV)  – Business  Development Intern                                                                           May  2022 – June  2022  
• Managed end to end client relationships and increased pre -acquisition client satisfaction by 20% through effective 
stakeholder management and engagement practices.  
• Developed the optimal customer journey map for the marketing function to increase flexibility of the marketing 
engagement strategy leading to a 25% increase in lead generation and 5% increase in client acquisition.  
Independent Marketing & Sales Consultant  – E-Commerce Centric                                  Sep 20 20 – Mar 2023  
• Increased average sales  by 20%  for a retail focused e -commerce client by providing end to end  solutions on demand & 
supply planning, operations management, and driving product sales.   
• Helped my clients find new products, managed social media advertisements, and created stores which later scaled to more 
than $20,000 individually.  
•  Automated company operations for 4 clients impr oving task completion rates by 60% by partnering up with Trello, Slack, 
and click funnel software .  
• Improved the store conversion  rate to 4% (1-2 % aver age) by taking a customer centric approach – using google analytics 
and A/B testing on optimized product portfolio of the store.   
LEADERSHIP EXPERIENCE  
Sahara Foundation  - Co-Founder                                                                                                                                      Jun 2020 – Present  
• Sahara is an NGO aiming to bridge the gap between the poor and the rich.  
• Launched the foundation during the pandemic and distributed ration to more than 100 de serving families.  
• Raised 1.5 million PKR through developing marketing and sponsorships proposals increasing historical fund raising by 30%.  
LUMS Environmental Action Forum  (LEAF)  - Project Lead                                                                                     Oct 2022 – Mar 2023  
• Led two engagement teams for local SMEs by conducting product portfolio analysis and developing growth strategy 
bringing in 0.1 million in PKR for LEAF.  
Projects & Research Experience  
• EcoSprings - Marketing Campaign for Eco -friendly Water Bottles : Wrote a case study for product entry of an eco -friendly 
bottled water brand  named EcoSprings. Forecasted entry level demand using bass diffusion model and projected 
profitability for the next two m onths .  
• Stock Valuation - Honda Cars Pakistan : Projected the sales of Honda Cars Pakistan for the next five years based on its past 
variation with inflation, GDP growth, Exchange rate, and automobile industry growth. The insights were used for 
investment perspectives .  
SKILLS & PERSONAL  
Languages : Urdu  (native), English (fluent), Punjabi (native)  
IT: MS Office (Complete), Facebook Advertising, Digital Marketing, Power BI  – Intermediate , JIRA , SQL – Advanced . 
Interests : Hiking & Mountaineering, Folk Music,  Singing ( Hip-hop/Rap), Travelling
input.additional_info: At Acme Corp, we prioritize candidates from diverse educational backgrounds with proven experience in high-pressure sales environments. We welcome graduates from reputable institutions but hold no particular preference for any university. Relocation support is available on a case-by-case basis. Skills assessment will include a practical marketing project to gauge capability in real-world scenarios, complemented by personal interviews to evaluate cultural fit and growth potential.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field
Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce)
Demonstrated ability in team leadership and mentoring
5+ years of experience in sales and marketing roles
